mapper.select: SELECT *, Floor(price*(1-discount/100)) AS salePrice FROM `mm_products` WHERE `cate1`=#{cate1} AND `cate2`=#{cate2} ORDER BY `sold` DESC ORDER BY `price` ASC ORDER BY `price` DESC ORDER BY `score` DESC ORDER BY `review` DESC ORDER BY `rdate` DESC
SELECT a.*, b.`cate1`, b.`cate2`, b.`thumb1` FROM `mm_products_cart` AS a JOIN `mm_products` AS b ON a.`code` = b.`code` WHERE `uid`=#{uid};
